description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              1) Design management responsibility:
              
              •	Reviewing and giving assessment to design documents of all stages and prepare evaluation report
              
              •	Convey quality and quantity control of design documents to ensure design complying with project brief.
              
              •	Giving rational critics and recommendation to consultants’ design documents
              
              •	Presenting the consultant’s design documents to the Chairman & Board of Directors
              
              •	Reviewing consultants’ contracts/service proposals including scope of work and fee
              
              •	Conduct and work with design consultants in value engineering exercise
              
              •	Prepare agenda and chair general/technical coordination meetings
              
              •	Reviewing and giving input to consultants’ specification
              
              •	Giving assessment and recommendation to project finish material schedules
              
              •	When required, propose competent design consultants/material & equipment suppliers that conform to each project’ requirement.
              
              •	Setup time schedule, work plan & man power schedule for design management division
              
              •	Responsible for project design consultant’s time schedule
              
              •	Preparing periodical work report per required
              
              •	When necessary conduct site visit for ensuring construction complying with design intent
              
              •	Managing project design management staff/design coordinator for different disciplines
              

              2) Coordination responsibility:
              
              •	General coordination between the Group’s internal departments and consultant teams for multiple projects across different location/provinces
              
              •	Coordination between design consultants & local statutory authorities
              
              •	Coordination between different local design consultants
              
              •	Coordination between local design consultants & local material and equipment suppliers/manufactures
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              1) Year of practice:
              
              1.1. Senior Design Management Manager - more than 15 years of professional practice in which:
              
              •	Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience as project design manager
              
              •	Minimum 3 years of relevant work experience as as PM and or CM
              
              •	Minimum 5 years of relevant work experience as as Senior Architect/Project architect in design consultant firms
              
              1.2. Design Management Manager - more than 8 years of professional practice in which:
              
              •	Minimum 1 years of relevant work experience as design management manager
              
              •	Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience as PM and or CM
              
              •	Minimum 3 years of relevant work experience as Senior Architect/Project architect in international design consultant firms
              

              2) Professional practice skills:
              
              •	Capability in English writing and speaking (Construction & Architectural Terminology)
              
              •	Good interpersonal communication and negotiation skill
              
              •	Ability in remote working, online meeting with international and local partners
              
              •	Substantial experience in design management of all project stages (from concept design to project practical completion)
              
              •	Proficient experience in reviewing/checking and evaluation of all design stages
              
              •	Proficient experience in project cost estimation and BOQ
              
              •	Proficient experience in project development procedures
              
              •	Substantial experience in site construction procedure
              
              •	Substantial experience in design and construction coordination between investor, statutory authorities, consultants and contractors/suppliers
              
              •	Proficient experience in reviewing of design consultant contract/scope of service
              
              •	Proficient experience in project management and construction management
              
              •	Proficient knowledge of local code & standard and other regulations
              
              •	Capable of setting up work plans, time & man load schedule
              
              •	Profound knowledge in Design Consultancy Service
              
              •	Knowledge in design of various types (hospitality, corporate, residential, commercial, public, leisure & entertainment) from Concept, SD, DD, CD, Construction Administration, Post-construction
              
              •	Experience in procedures for urban design and detailed master plan
              
              •	Ability in hosting and working with state competent authorities
              
              •	Ability in remote working, online meeting with international and local partners
              

              3) Design & Document skills:
              
              •	Capable of developing project from schematic design to design development & construction documentation stage.
              
              •	Capable of compiling design brief, report & specification
              

              4) Computer skills:
              
              •	Microsoft Project
              
              •	Microsoft Power Point
              
              •	Adobe Acrobat Professional 6.0, 7.0, 9.0
              
              •	AutoCAD Release 2007, 2009, 2010, 2014
              
              •	Microsoft Excel, MS Word
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
